items.title: The Beginning
items.description: Started my tech journey by exploring different domains. Set up my development environment and created my first HTML page.

items.title: Building Foundations
items.description: Dove deeper into CSS styling and started learning JavaScript basics. Explored cybersecurity concepts through online courses.

items.title: Cloud Discovery
items.description: Started AWS Cloud Practitioner preparation. Built my first responsive website and learned about cloud infrastructure.

items.title: Testing & Quality
items.description: Introduced to QA concepts and manual testing. Started writing test cases for my projects and understanding SDLC.

items.title: Building Portfolio
items.description: Creating this portfolio to showcase my learning journey. Combining all skills learned so far into practical projects.

items.title: Certification Prep
items.description: Planning to pursue CompTIA Security+ and AWS Cloud Practitioner certifications while continuing to build projects.
